Name: STEIIARIA
About the game: STEIARIA is a 2D match 3 roguelike, a limitless space lo-fi adventure for all lovers of puzzles and fun! Mahjong, space and planet combine to give you a wonderful gaming experience and enjoy this game. Collect pairs of space rocks, conquer new groups and conquer new levels, but remember - the game is endless and will keep you entertained for as long as you need! Features: -Graphics ин YolkinS -Misic by YolkinS -Endless mode
